solution_line_template: Tina has already cleaned one key so she has {keys_left} left which take {minutes_per_key} minutes each to clean, {keys_left} x {minutes_per_key} = <<{keys_left}*{minutes_per_key}={cleaning_time}>>{cleaning_time} minutes to clean all the keyboard keys.
Her assignment will take {assignment_time} minutes to complete, so she needs {cleaning_time} minutes + {assignment_time} minutes = {total_time} minutes total before dinner.
